title: My Google pixel 4a is dead and won't turn on but battery is charging still not working.what to do?
content: Pixel 4a is turn off completely.i have transfer my files from my old phone to Google pixel 4a and after that i charge it upto 84%and unplugged it from charger but as soon as i unplugged it from cable it turn off completely and i again charge and make turn on and now this time it turn off completely and not turning on.i have tried to hard reset but its not working
